briefTitle: Pilot Evaluation of Two Test Materials With a Positive Control When Used as a Patient Preoperative Skin Preparation
officialTitle: Pilot Evaluation of Two Test Materials With a Positive Control When Used as a Patient Preoperative Skin Preparation
summary: Comparative Study of Antimicrobial Effectiveness Evaluation of 26ml Project X, 5.1ml Project X and Prevantics Maxi Swabstick following ASTM E1173 - Standard Test Method for Evaluation of Preoperative, Precatheterization, or Preinjection Skin Preparations, ASTM International, West Conshohocken, Pennsylvania, 2015

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Bacterial Microflora on the Inguinal Area
